title: The ONLY Times Men Are Allowed To Cry
description:
If you are a man, congratulations. You’ve won. However, such victory also comes with some responsibility. As a male, it’s your duty to exhibit strength and fortitude, and to show no weakness.  Here is a comprehensive list of the only instances it is acceptable for men to shed a tear.
